title: VA - Jazz & Hijaz 1 & 2 (Jazz & Tzaz)@320
description:
Hijaz is the name of a mode (maqam) in Arabic music.


These cds contain &#039;ethno-jazz&#039; tracks,recorded in USA in 60&#039;&#039;s and 70&#039;s.
The artists are Greeks, Armenians, Hebrews, Americans and others.


Released with the Greek magazine &#039;Jazz & Tzaz&#039;. Rare stuff!
